title: Inadequate cache control in gitter allows to view private chat room

profile.name: GitLab
profile.about: A single application for the entire software development lifecycle.

vulnerability_information:
Hi Gitlab,

**Summary:**
I have found a inadequate cache control vulnerability in Gitter.

**Description:**
You can use the backspace button to get the full access to the account. There is no cache control and the browser saves sensitive information of a private chat room.
This report is influenced by the disclosed report #407763. The impact and attack scenario is also the same.

## Steps To Reproduce:

1. Sign in to Gitter
2. Go to a private room
3. Sign-out from the device
4. Click on backspace
5. Chat in the private room

You can access the private room without actually being logged in. You can also chat from the logged out account.

## Impact

Sensitive information can get disclosed through a single backspace.
vulnerability_information_html:
Hi Gitlab,

Summary:
I have found a inadequate cache control vulnerability in Gitter.

Description:
You can use the backspace button to get the full access to the account. There is no cache control and the browser saves sensitive information of a private chat room.
This report is influenced by the disclosed report #407763. The impact and attack scenario is also the same.

Steps To Reproduce:

  1. Sign in to Gitter
  2. Go to a private room
  3. Sign-out from the device
  4. Click on backspace
  5. Chat in the private room

You can access the private room without actually being logged in. You can also chat from the logged out account.

Impact

Sensitive information can get disclosed through a single backspace.

activities.message:
Hi @dhakalananda,

Thank you for submitting this report. We will investigate the issue as soon as possible.
Due to our current workload, we will get back within 20 business days with an update.

Please refrain from submitting your report or inquiring about its status through
additional channels, as this unnecessarily binds resources in the security team.

Best regards,
GitLab Security Team

activities.message:
Hi @dhakalananda,

please note that we no longer accept reports that require physical access to the victim's computer such as https://hackerone.com/reports/407763.

Regarding your other finding that a user can still chat even though he previously signed out, we received a report before about this issue. I will mark your report as a duplicate of this report.

Best regards,
Dennis

activities.message: Requesting disclosure so that other hackers are aware about this exclusion and don't report this bug over and over again.

activities.message:
Hi everyone,

Just to let you know that this vulnerability has now been fixed.
